privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The protection of your personal data is very important to us.
privacy.dsg: This privacy policy is based on the Swiss Data Protection Act (DSG) and the GDPR.
privacy.data_text: We only collect personal data in the context of platform usage: name, email, phone, company details.
privacy.cookies_text: Our website uses technically necessary cookies. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
privacy.rights_text: You have the right to access, rectify and delete your data. Contact us at info@probau.ch.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: By using the ProBau.ch platform, you agree to these terms and conditions.
terms.scope_text: These terms apply to all users of the ProBau.ch platform, including project owners and contractors.
terms.registration_text: Use of the platform requires registration with truthful information.
terms.services_text: Project owners can post projects for free. Contractors require a paid subscription.
terms.liability_text: ProBau.ch is not liable for the content of projects and offers posted by users.
terms.law_text: Swiss law applies. The place of jurisdiction is Zurich.
